event.title: WebRTC
event.description:
James Jackson (real name, not an adult entertainer) has kindly stepped in to tell us about WebRTC.

WebRTC is a free, open project that enables web browsers with Real-Time Communications (RTC) capabilities via simple Javascript APIs. The WebRTC components have been optimized to best serve this purpose.

Mission: To enable rich, high quality, RTC applications to be developed in the browser via simple Javascript APIs and HTML5.

 

We will have 15 minutes at the end for Ask The Audience, chaired by our very own Steve James!
